column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/f8c06169b6927f3811e59e5b4705487df4ce9b5c for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
AFAIK these were needed, if we set `setChecked()` for any of these from external modules? Did you verify that e.g. using the context/try menu brings the window to front still?\n
Hmm, you're right, sendcoins/receivecoins actions are also in the tray menu.\n
IMHO it's better to leave these connected or at least add a comment, that when used via tray or other methods, one needs to ensure that `showNormalIfMinimized()` needs to be called.\n
Yes, I'll remove this from the pull and add a comment.\n
